title: Which are the most helpful apps that we can use in case of an emergency? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mobile apps can save you in emergency situations. The smartphones are that smart to lets you survive through emergencies. Smartphones are capable of so many things. Not just entertainment, it can save your life too. So let’s know about some amazing apps that can come handy in emergency situations.  Family Locator: This locator by Life360 generally works as a tracker. You can connect with your family and friends. This location sharing app keeps the record of family and friends. It will place your close ones on the map. So you can know where they are any given time. Also, the people in the circle can turn off the locater. This app is very helpful when you travel to unknown places. Family members can send alert to the close circle. Whenever you reach some place or leave the place, they can send messages and share tasks.  Red panic button: When in a dire emergency, go for the red panic button. This app will send an emergency alert to any number or email with just a button press. You can set an emergency message to contact the person. The message will be sent if you press the button. This will send an alert to your location. It works with GPS, so as long as there is a connection, you can use it.  Siren GPS: This is also a GPS based app. You can send an SOS by just pressing one button. However, you not just can send the emergency message to your family but directly to Police, ambulance and firefighters. So whenever you find yourself in an unfamiliar place. Or maybe you’re jogging through an unknown alley, if something feels off, you can definitely use this app. As long as you have a connection, you’re good to go. With the facility of sending alert to police, ambulance, and firefighters.  SOS emergency app: It is traveller friendly. This app will also let you contact your family and police, ambulance and fire. This app comes with default police siren, which can help alert any bad guys around you. It comes with photo mail feature. You can send the picture of a person and send it to your contacts. It has whistle voice, to create attention.  Guardly mobile: This app is best for work spaces and organizations. This app can be the security in an office. It will send emergency alerts to the staff and members if any emergency shows up. If there is an imminent threat in the mall, the security guard can send an alert. It can also be used for theft, fires too. These apps can save lives in emergency situations. So get a latest smartphone and install them. Source: 5 Apps That Will Come Handy In Emergency Situations
